channel.description: Recent content in weight on Data Trigger

item.title: Weighted Random Forest with Spark 3
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: The third version of the number one distributed computing framework Spark was released in June 2020. Sample weights support was implemented for tree-based algorithms: decision tree, gradient tree boosting and random forest. Today we experiment with this new feature on an imbalanced dataset about credit card fraud.
